resources.string: This is the start time of the Event. Like you have an appointment at this time
This is the end time of the Event. For e.g your appointment must end 2 hours after the start.
You will get the notification of the event before 30 mins of start time
Click on the below button to add a Reminder. Each click will add single reminder. Reminders are\n 30 min, 20 min, 10 min, 5 min
